--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine thinks "Damn, theres more holes in this place than 
craters 
> on the moon." after hearing Ramhorns message. "Megatrons been a 
thorn 
> in the Maximals side since the Maximals were Autobots, I say we 
teach 
> this megalomaniac (I love that word) that the Maximals aren't just 
> defenders, I say we turn him into so much scrap that garbage skows 
> reject him."
